revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_MinotaurDeath}} '''A_MinotaurDeath'''
(no parameters) Puts the calling actor in its FadeOut state if the MNTRF1 or MNTRF0 sprites are not present. Such a function was needed because Hexen does not feature the full minotaur sprite sets, as the {{Class|MinotaurFriend|dark servants}} were not supposed to die, same reason that Hexen's minotaur sprites are [[sprite renaming|renamed at load-time]]. If the expected death frame sprites are present, does nothing. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Minotaur}} and derived classes. [[Category:Decorate Heretic functions]] [[Category:Decorate Hexen functions]] [[Category:Decorate Status change functions]] [[Category:Decorate Restricted functions]]{{DEFAULTSORT:MinotaurDeath}}
